title: cheezcarls
author: cheezcarls
content: Source: https://bitpinas.com/business/legend-of-constellations-rugpull/Ever since nakita ko itong Legends of Constellation, alam ko na mangin next rug pull in the making toh. Nung nakita ko pa lang mga ROI tables nila for each tier ng character nila, alams na agad.Plus hindi ito talaga crypto NFT game dahil wala sila sa data aggregators from CoinMarketCap at Coingecko. It means to say that they do not have any smart contract at all for the LOCC token, which is not really a crypto. It's just like any other imaginary in-game coin na hindi crypto.Sa local community ko isa sa mga sumali dun bye2x na yung $58 nya sa pag invest sa Legends of Constellation. Wala na magawa kundi lessons learned na lang.Hanggang ngayon ang mga Pinoy prone pa rin sa mga too good to be true na mga opportunity like this na may ridiculous na ROI tables. Dahil reality nowadays sa mga Web3 NFT games mas na focus na ata tayo sa earning side rather than the fun side. Alam ko this is not going to be the last dahil meron pa siguro ibang similar ponzi games na waiting na lang the opportunity to peak bago mag initiate ng exit scam at rug pull at a future date.
